menuText:
I am Rafal, and currently have been working as a Front End Developer.

Up till now have worked on many different projects, and in each of them I have used and developed my technical skills in different areas including development, web design and web usability, accessibility, web marketing, management and testing skills.

I am an experienced, University-educated Front End Developer whose objective is to build up my already existing technical skills, whilst working in a team environment. I am passionate about development and always keen to work with the latest technologies against Agile.

Languages

X/HTML5, CSS2/3 , OO Javascript, jQuery, Backbone, RaphaelJS, PHP, MySQL, C++, Assembler, Action Script 3

debugging in iOS and Windows, and Android environments.

Mobile Platform

Phone Gap/Cordova

Versioning control systems

Git/GitFlow and SVN

Systems

Linux, Windows, DOS, MacOS

Applications

MS Office, Photoshop, Illustrator, Visual Web Developer, Adobe Flash

Here you can find my websites, which have been done using different techniques

  • http://www.samsung.com/uk/london2012 - Olympic Games as well as Paralympics Games website
    Technical requirements: PHP5 + MySQL + JSON + jQuery + JavaScript + HTML + CSS3
  • http://m.samsung.com/uk/london2012 - Olympic Games as well as Paralympics Games website mobile version
    Technical requirements: PHP5 + MySQL + JSON + jQuery + JavaScript + HTML + CSS3

  • http://www.asfenner.co.uk

    Technical requirements: HTML + CSS + JavaScript + Flash + ActionScript
  • www.casthr.com/ - First version of the Cast Resourcing website
    Technical requirements: xHTML + CSS3 + JavaScript + jQuery + Flash + PHP + MySQl

    Technical requirements: xHTML + DHTML + LightBox + jQuery + PHP + MySQL

  • http://www.morgantechnicalceramics.com

  • http://www.brcglobalstandards.com
